head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FARAH, JOSEPH JOHN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FARAH, JOSEPH JOHN

block.p: FARAH-Joseph John. On October 5, 2000 of Newark, NJ. Beloved husband of Awatif (nee Sadaka). Beloved father of Jeffrey Farah & Monica Farah-Stapleton. Beloved brother of Philip Farah and Rose Farah. Dear grandfather of Alexandra Farah. Funeral from the Galante Funeral Home, 17 Pacific St. at Walnut St. Newark, NJ on Saturday at 10AM. Funeral Mass at St. James Church, Newark, NJ at 11 AM. Interment Holy Cross Cemetery. Visitation Friday 2-4 & 7-9 PM. In lieu flowers, donations to the American Heart Association N.J. Affiliate Memorials Program, 2550 Rt. 1 North Brunswick, NJ 08902-4301, would be appreciated.

FARAH-Joseph John. On October 5, 2000 of Newark, NJ. Beloved husband of Awatif (nee Sadaka). Beloved father of Jeffrey Farah & Monica Farah-Stapleton. Beloved brother of Philip Farah and Rose Farah. Dear grandfather of Alexandra Farah. Funeral from the Galante Funeral Home, 17 Pacific St. at Walnut St. Newark, NJ on Saturday at 10AM. Funeral Mass at St. James Church, Newark, NJ at 11 AM. Interment Holy Cross Cemetery. Visitation Friday 2-4 & 7-9 PM. In lieu flowers, donations to the American Heart Association N.J. Affiliate Memorials Program, 2550 Rt. 1 North Brunswick, NJ 08902-4301, would be appreciated.
